segments.text: Much better , thanks . I have been resting all day . Only with television as my companion.In fact , in the whole week the only thing I feel like doing was watching TV .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I started with game show this morning , I really enjoy them , and even answered the most of questions correctly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: At 2 o'clock , I switched to the Channel 6 , and watched a terrific movie without commercials .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know what you mean , there wasn't old action movie next . I think you won't like it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to watch it , but I was already tired by the time it came on . I had a rest instead , then I watched the news at Channel 11 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A bank was robbed this afternoon . A reporter on the scene covered the event , the live coverage reproduce the robbery to the live .
segments.speaker: S2
